data.title: What Channel Is The North Dakota Vs. Michigan Game On?
data.meta_description: North Dakota will play against Michigan in Maryland Heights Regional of the 2024 NCAA Men's Hockey Tournament.
data.text:
North Dakota hockey and Michigan hockey enter their matchup at the NCAA Men's Hockey Tournament both as unranked teams, but at No. 6 and No. 10, respectively, in the final Pairwise Rankings for the 2024 season.

North Dakota has one of the best resumes in the NCAA Tournament, defeating a handful of fellow participants. NDU had wins against Macklin Celebrini's Boston University team, Wisconsin, Minensota, Denver, Omaha and Western Michigan. The Fighting Hawks had an overall record of 26-11-2--tied for the fourth-highest win total in the NCAA this season.

Subscribe To FloHockey For More Hockey Games And News

Analyzing The Hobey Baker Top 10

Here Are The 16 Teams That Made The NCAA Men's Hockey Tournament

Michigan had an overall record of 21-14-3 this season. The Wolverines had wins against Wisconsin, Michigan State and UMass this season, but notably, are fresh off the heels of a well-contested overtime loss against rivals Michigan State in the Big Ten Conference Tournament final.

The Wolverines are one of, if not the most historic hockey programs in NCAA Men's Hockey history. They are currently tied with the Denver Pioneers for the most Frozen Four championships all-time--both teams appear in the tournament this year.

Michigan is led by Rutger McGroarty and Gavin Brindley, both players appeared on Team USA's World Juniors championship team.

North Dakota will play Michigan on March 29, at 8:30pm ET in Maryland Heights, Mo.

What Channel Is The North Dakota Vs. Michigan Hockey Game On?

The game will be available to watch and stream on ESPNU and the ESPN+ app.

Who Does The Winner Of North Dakota Vs. Michigan Play?

The winner of the North Dakota vs. Michigan matchup will play the winner of Michigan State vs. Western Michigan.

Can Michigan Hockey And Michigan State Play In The Frozen Four 2024?

Yes. Michigan hockey and Michigan State hockey can play in the NCAA Men's Hockey Tournament. Both the Wolverines and the Spartans are in the Maryland Heights Regional and will play each other if each wins their respective first-round matchups. The game would be a rematch of the Big Ten Tournament final, which MSU won in overtime, 5-4.

Who Is Playing In The Providence Regional?

No. 1 Boston College will meet Michigan Tech, while Wisconsin will take on defending champion Quinnipiac.

Who Is Playing In The Springfield Regional?

No. 3 Denver will be playing Springfield regional host UMass, while Maine will take on ECAC tournament champion Cornell.

Who Is Playing In The Maryland Heights Regional?

No. 4 overall Michigan State will take on in-state foe Western Michigan, while North Dakota will go head-to-head against Michigan.

Who Is Playing In The Sioux Falls Regional?

No. 2 Boston University will be playing Atlantic Hockey champion RIT, while Minnesota will meet regional host school Omaha.

Where To Watch The 2024 NCAA Men's Hockey Tournament

ESPN's family of networks is the broadcast home for the 2024 NCAA men's hockey tournament. Regional games will primarily air on ESPNU and ESPNEWS with select games airing on ESPN2. All games will also stream exclusively on ESPN+.
